Package api.entity

Interface GameObject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Entity, Item
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameObject, AbstractItem, Activatable, Book, Button, Chest, Door, Floor, Key, Library, Pane, Player, PressurePlate, Room, Switch
    public interface GameObject
extends IDInterface
    Un object du jeu
    Since:
    4.0 23/12/2019
    Version:
    4.0 23/12/2019
    Author:
